short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly find exactly what you're looking for in your browsing history. The best history search tool with advanced filtering options.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the History Searchable extension, enter any keyword you want to search for to find web pages of interest. By default, the search box performs a general search. Any page you have visited that contains the entered keyword in the title, URL, or text will appear in the search results list.
If you want to add more specific search criteria, use the advanced search by clicking the ‘Advanced’ button. With the advanced search boxes, you can specify the search rule: which keywords to include or exclude and their position (page title, URL, or page content). You can add as many search criteria as you like.
